Edited January 26, 2017 by Elthy

Not a guarantee by any means, but probably a good idea to scour your email and find all of the purchase receipts for as many games on your account as possible (they have transaction details and identifiers on there, might help your case).

Personally I have found steam support to be quite OK, if a little slow in responding. Find the form that lets you type out your problem and do it that way. Explain clearly what happened, bullet points help. Tell them you have all of you purchase receipts (if you find them).

Also, if you have any other accoutns that use the same login information (ebay, paypal, amazon etc.) might be a good idea to change them up.
